rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Vastu-compliant placement near the main gate. Natural light through openings.
Open space living area with Kerala-style design elements and wooden detailing. Adjoining the entrance hall.
Dedicated dining area with ample seating and a view of the garden.
Functional kitchen space with traditional Kerala-style layout, including an outdoor prep area adjacent to the garden.
Well-ventilated bathroom with water-saving fixtures and natural light from adjacent openings.
Spacious two-car garage integrated into the design with direct access to the main road. Complies with local building norms.
Dedicated home office designed for a quiet and productive environment. Windows ensure natural light in accordance with Vastu.
Storage space for miscellaneous items, strategically placed to maintain balance per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing east to welcome positive energy. Vastu compliant.
Large windows in the living room and home office for ample natural light.
Heavy-duty garage door with automatic closing mechanism for ease of use.
